name: Get Out (itch) (AngeloE28)
description:
Description:

#TorrensFreedomJam

Escape the area or be trapped inside it, the choice is yours.

A first person escape room, with the freedom to walk on almost anything for sacrificing jump power. 

Use this freedom of movement to escape the area or stay trapped forever.

This was made for the Torrens "Freedom" Jam(2021)
